name: Captain Football Euro 2016
description:
Defeat every team and become the European football champion !

From the first session, the competition begins. Your player starts with a neutral jersey, and braves an European team, final objective : Win the Euro !

The goal is clear, cross an enormous football field to score a goal while avoiding defenders., referees or lost fans who express there happiness on the field.

During each sessions, your player can collect coins, allowing you to unlock new balls, new football shirts (more than 50 to collect) and thus to represent new teams during the competition.

The game starts with the group stage of the competition, after each game won, your team will go to the Round of 16 then Quarter-finals and so on until the final.

In Captain Football, you can also challenge your friends via social networks! In a friendly match, two players can challenge each others with their favorite team. The player who will score the most goals will win the match.

Good Game!

Apple Store : https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/captain-football-e...

Google Play : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

[How to play]

Arrows to move

Space to shoot

Mouse for buttons
